EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone furnace at position(5.0, -70.0)
This structure smelts iron ore into iron plates.
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (5.0, -70.0)

### Coal mine at position(40.5, -82.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill at (x=44.0 y=-90.0)
-  Burner mining drill at (x=50.0 y=-90.0)
-  Burner mining drill at (x=38.0 y=-87.0)

-  Burner mining drill at (x=49.0 y=-87.0)
-  Burner mining drill at (x=40.0 y=-85.0)
-  Burner mining drill at (x=43.0 y=-84.0)
-  Burner mining drill at (x=46.0 y=-84.0)
-  Burner mining drill at (x=49.0 y=-84.0)
-  Burner inserter at (x=44.5 y=-86.5)
-  Burner inserter at (x=52.5 y=-86.5)
-  Burner inserter at (x=49.5 y=-82.5)
-  Wooden chest at (x=37.5 y=-88.5)
-  Wooden chest at (x=47.5 y=-88.5)
-  Wooden chest at (x=50.5 y=-88.5)
-  Wooden chest at (x=44.5 y=-88.5)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Trying to insert the wrong item type into a building
- Ensure you are inserting the correct item type into the building. For example, iron ore should be inserted into a furnace, not the other way around
### Trying to craft an item without having the raw materials
- Ensure you have the raw materials to craft an item. For example, you need stone to craft a stone furnace and wood to craft a wooden chest

NAMESPACE
